sub_title: Global Senior Manager - Procurement Operations at Booking.com
summary:
Dedicated Leader with over 20 years’ experience in delivering complex IT Deployment and Procurement Transformation Projects on a Global Scale. 

Proven ability to lead and develop teams in delivering projects from initial planning through to procurement, implementation and delivery.

Putting the customer at the center of everything I do, a true professional in ensuring their needs are met and requirements are delivered.

My leadership role at Booking.com demands excellent People, Project Management and Team Development skills, along with strong vendor negotiation ability to meet the ever growing business needs, from working with key members of the Leadership team, Finance, Vendors, Regional and Local Account Managers, my role requires me to manage multiple projects and effectively guide the teams to ensure timelines and SLAs are achieved. 

Delivering  IT and Procurement Transformation Projects with an eye for detail is something I am very passionate about, being focused and in control is something I pride myself on.

profile_positions.title: Global Senior Manager - Procurement Operations

profile_positions.description:
Managing the procurement team I am responsible for implementing and executing a clear and effective technology purchasing strategy ensuring that all spend fuels business growth. I have ownership of direction and decision making for all Tech spend in IT Services, covering hardware, software, voice and connectivity services, supporting a team of 4 Technology Procurement Coordinators. 

The procurement team directly impacts all 15,000 Booking.com colleagues and make purchasing decisions that support the IT Services vision of delivering the ‘’Best Digital Workplace’’ My role takes ownership of budgeting and spend, along with Vendor negotiations at CEO level to ensure the best deal possible for Booking and our colleagues. 

In addition to Procurement, I also Manage the Branch Deployment team, responsible for delivering in excess of 200 projects globally. Shape and define the strategy working closely with my Team Leads to ensure all Deployment Managers and Deployment Engineers are delivering all New, Move and Office Expansion projects on time and to budget. 

Strong leadership skills required to own the Branch build process, working closely with all teams in ITS, especially on a Technical level and Product.

I coach and mentor all team members to deliver to the highest level of Project Management and Engineering ability, with a global reach as the team is geographically spread in Amsterdam, Singapore and Seattle. 

Developing and building relationships with Real Estate, Finance and a number of other Teams such as, Network Engineering, Internet Transport, Security, Voice Engineering, Business and IT Support Product Owners to plan, design, build and implement the continued expansion of Booking.com locations globally.

In my role as a member of the IT Services Leadership Team I help and contribute to defining strategy and vision in addition to decision making processes, directly supporting  the CIO and influencing my peers on Technology purchasing and deployment.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for overall Management of the IT Branch Team to deliver IT build projects Worldwide, the team covers IT Project and Deployment Managers, Technical Team Lead and Technicians, my team is tasked with the Scoping, Build Out, Opening and Go Live of all Infrastructure for new Branch Offices and Call Centers for Booking.com Globally. This encompasses managing a team of 14 FTE's based out of Amsterdam, Seattle and Singapore. 

Developing and building relationships with Real Estate, Finance and a number of other IT Teams and individuals such as Network Engineering, Internet Transport, Security, Voice Engineering, Business and IT Support Product Owners to plan, design, build and implement the continued expansion of Booking.com locations. 

Manage IT Budgets and build Supplier relationships, negotiate contracts plus management and implementation of tools that facilitate growth and automation in delivering IT Services, in addition to coaching and training new hires, along with managing the full expectations of Senior Management.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all Group IT requirements within Mammoet, who are a large International Transport Company employing over 70 staff in 5 Countries. 
Responsible for developing new Transport Operations Software System, and implementing a complete desktop/server hardware replacement project using HP and Compaq equipment covering 8 sites and 70 staff.
Project plan in conjunction with KMPG in Holland. Design Transport Software with Continental Software Services based in Edinburgh.
Deliver Server and Desktop hardware to all sites, install and configure each server for MS Exchange and connect to Domain with PDC based in Rotterdam. Install and configure SQL 2000 Server on Cluster in Rotterdam to run Transport System Database, and install ODBC client software to each desktop UK/Europe to enable database access.
Install Transport Operations Applications to each Site with link to SQL Server in Rotterdam. 
Be responsible for testing all releases of updated Transport Applications, whilst working closely with all staff that had requested changes. Deploy updated Applications to all sites overnight.
Migrate Server and User data from old Compaq hardware to new Dell Servers and Desktops. 
Design and arrange installation of Cat5 cabling at new HQ in Runcorn and Glasgow. Install rack mounted Routers/Switches, add broadband and firewall to domain, configure and install all printers for the UK.
Responsibilities
•	Setup of Wide Area Network, across 5 Countries.
•	Designed new bespoke Transport Software System.
•	Installation of Cluster Servers / SQL 2000 Database.
•	Installation of Server / PC Hardware UK & Europe.
•	Onsite and Remote Support for all users on system.
•	Travel between the UK and European Sites.
•	Overall Responsibility for Delivery of New IT Systems & Software.
•	Source and Project Plan with 3rd Party Software and Hardware Suppliers.
•	Implement rollout of the Desktop and Server Hardware, UK & Europe.
